titleStmt.title: Elizabeth by the grace of God Queene of England, France, and Ireland ... to all and singuler archbishops, bishops, archdecons, deanes and their officials ... know ye, that whereas the prisoners in the custodye of the marshall of the Marshalsey ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.

titleStmt.title: Elizabeth by the grace of God Queene of England, France, and Ireland ... to all and singuler archbishops, bishops, archdecons, deanes and their officials ... know ye, that whereas the prisoners in the custodye of the marshall of the Marshalsey ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from STC (2nd ed.)
Title information from first 9 lines of text.
For one-year collection for relief of prisoners in the Marshalsea.
"At our Mannor of Eastgreenwich the nine & twentieth day of September, in the eight and thirteth [sic] yeere of our raigne."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
